name: Bazair
overview: A multi-genre on game where each screen is something different. The first level is straight action, avoid the bouncing blocks to get the key and escape, the second is a skill platformer where you need to jump from platform to platform to get to your rocket. The third is an avoid it level where you must avoid the asteroids to make it to the next planet, the next is lunar lander style landing of your ship, then a mini puzzle game, where you need to match the movements on 2 sections of blocks, then a space navigation challenge, then on to another simple platformer. Lot of mini games fun from Michael Ware and published in Commodore Disk User 1989/03-04 and also in Your Commodore 1991/02 (Tape #14)
